item.title: Combining Like Terms
item.description: Polynomial Operations, Combining Like Terms.Mathematics Skill Enhancement Tool for Primary and Secondary School Students. Secondary School, Middle School, High School. Factoring. Automatic Question Generation, Error Correction

item.title: Basic Operations
item.description: Operations within 10 for Addition and Subtraction, within 100 for Addition and Subtraction, Multiplication and Division. Fraction and Decimal Operations, Mixed OperationsMathematical Skills Support Tool for Elementary and Middle School Students. Suitable for Preschoolers, Elementary School Students, and Middle School Students. Simple Calculations, Automatic Question Generation.
